nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
nodes.name: SafeMath
Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership
Claimable

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier throws if called by any account other than the pendingOwner.
nodes.name: onlyPendingOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.
nodes.name: claimOwnership
ERC20Basic

nodes.documentation:
@title ERC20 interface
@dev see https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20
nodes.name: ERC20

nodes.documentation:
@title Basic token
@dev Basic version of StandardToken, with no allowances.
nodes.name: BasicToken
transfer
balanceOf
LimitedTransferToken

nodes.documentation: @dev Checks whether it can transfer or otherwise throws.
nodes.name: canTransfer
transfer
transferFrom
transferableTokens
StandardToken
transferFrom
approve
allowance

nodes.documentation:
approve should be called when allowed[_spender] == 0. To increment
allowed value is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until
the first transaction is mined)
From MonolithDAO Token.sol
nodes.name: increaseApproval
MintableToken
mint

nodes.documentation:
@dev Function to stop minting new tokens.
@return True if the operation was successful.
nodes.name: finishMinting

nodes.documentation: BancorSmartToken
nodes.name: LimitedTransferBancorSmartToken

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if destroy flag is not enabled.
nodes.name: canDestroy

nodes.documentation: A Token which is 'Bancor' compatible and can mint new tokens and pause token-transfer functionality
nodes.name: FuzexSmartToken
Crowdsale
TokenPurchase
FinalizableCrowdsale

nodes.documentation:
@dev Must be called after crowdsale ends, to do some extra finalization
work. Calls the contract's finalization function.
nodes.name: finalize
finalization

nodes.documentation:
@dev Accepts new ownership on behalf of the SirinCrowdsale contract. This can be used, by the token sale
 contract itself to claim back ownership of the SirinSmartToken contract.
nodes.name: claimTokenOwnership
